name: places/ChIJh8tDaxv2wokRmojkb4iG9gk
adrFormatAddress: 1274 5th Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
This company is absolutely excellent! They are honest, trustworthy, and consistent - and clean!

They did work on my roof almost two years ago and have had no issues. A separate comcern came up and I asked Mike to check it for me. Mike had his team visit, inspect, discuss options, and do the work at their earliest convenience. Mike's coordination was great. I was unable to be home but this team accessed the roof, did the work, texted me pictures throughout, and cleaned up afterward like nothing happened.

And this team tells you EVERYTHING they are doing, and they are thorough. If you are like me and know nothing about roofing, they will teach you, and you will know A LOT more after hiring them and will appreciate it. Peace of mind is priceless and this team will assure you have it.

originalText.text:
This has been an over year long experience with this company.

We had a leaking roof on commercial property, and received a quote from Goldenberg Roofing.  The initial quote was reasonably competitive, and due to the good reviews, we decided to move forward with them.

Red flag #1: They revised their initial quote and doubled it, claiming that the initial quote was from someone who does not work for them anymore

Red flag #2: As soon as they started the work, they tore open the roof and claimed that there were unforeseen costs of the repair and that they would need an additional $20,000 to finish the repair.  At this point the roof was dismantled and the business underneath was dependent on not having rain pour into the building.

The best thing to have done would have been to cut ties with this company and to move onto the next. But of course, we didn't...

We trusted the word of Eden, and paid him for the surprise repairs that were urgently needed.

At this point we were double in the initial quote to repair the roof, and that to complete the repair it would take double the amount we were already in, that's four times the initial quote. At the same time Eden said the most urgent repairs were done.

Over the next 11 months the initial leak was worse than ever, and instead of a steady leak, there was a constant stream into the building interior during rainfall.  This increased damage that was being done by the leak, compared to how the building was before Goldenberg Roofing touched the building.

I reached out to Eden mid December 2017 for details on what work he did and proof.  Over the course of 2.5 weeks he only responses have been text messages of apologies and excuses about emergencies and he can't even be bothered to send me proof of the work he's done.

On top of that I have consulted with other roofing companies who have looked at the roof, and said that the roof repair could've been fully repaired for not only less than what we have already paid to Goldenberg Roofing, but that the work they have done was about 1/3rd of the job that needed to be done, but charged at a rate that was 450% higher than what they would have charged to do the same work.

This has been our experience for the past 12 months. Stay away, and there are plenty of other roofing companies to go with.

originalText.text: We hired goldenberg roofing to fix our leaks on our commercial building. They provided us we unbeatable service and warranty that other companies could not offer. They were very Professional and curtious company , answered all our questions before the job started and during the project. They did the job in 2 days which was 3x times faster then what we were quoted by other roofers. They come highly recommended by us and will be used again for our other properties.

originalText.text: Renovex installed insulated vinyl siding on our home. It looks great without any seams. You really can't tell it from wood clapboard without touching it. We were very pleased with the low cost and the money we will save in heating and cooling costs. I would recommend this siding and roofing contractor for good quality work at a reasonable price.

originalText.text: Goldenberg oversold us on the job. Moreover, I accidentally overpaid them by $10k (I wrote two checks but cancelled the first when it was too late) over a year ago and wasn't paid back. I consider this stealing and filed a lawsuit. Horrible company.
